<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ensnaring Disk](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2105)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 93 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 70 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You use the affixed shield to [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) a melee weapon attack

**Requirement** You are an expert in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3).
</row>

</column>

---

This coin-sized metal disk is inscribed with arcane symbols and mounted on the inner surface of a shield. When you Activate the disk, the triggering weapon momentarily sticks to your shield, allowing you to attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) it from its wielder with a +2 item bonus. If you roll a critical failure on this check, you get a failure instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Ensnaring Disk
requirement: You are an expert in  Athletics .
